Package ch.nolix.core.endPoint4

Class EndPoint<M,R>

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.nolix.core.bases.ClosableElement
      • ch.nolix.core.endPoint4.EndPoint<M,R>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IGenericSender2<M,R>, Closable, java.lang.AutoCloseable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LocalEndPoint, NetEndPoint

    public abstract class EndPoint<M,R>
extends ClosableElement
implements IGenericSender2<M,R>
    An end point can send messages to an other end point of the same type. An end point is abortable.
    Author:
    Silvan Wyss
